description.value:
Befitting their small frames, gnome inventors have perfected high-tech compression techniques to be able to fit large amounts of fabric in small spaces. Gnomish duffels are ideal for travelers into the unknown, where regular lodgings might not be freely available, or for those purposefully vacationing in a wilderness. A gnomish duffel functions as a type of backpack and contains a type of tent compressed into a lighter bulk depending on the itemâ€™s model. As a move action, you can cause the tent to spring forth from the duffel fully pitched into an adjacent space, ready to use. It takes 10 minutes to refold the tent to fit back into the duffel.

A mk 1 gnomish duffel functions as a @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.equipment.Item.dcv9AivhC4IRGMp4]{consumer backpack} and contains a compressed @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.equipment.Item.zOvF12YES7pyom6I]{mass-produced tent}
